info.name: ELIAN ► SESSION MANAGER (FF-ADD-ON)
info.description: A style for the Firefox add-on Session Manager
info.additionalInfo: (All appologies for my english) For Scrollbars see style 89732 NOTES: • TESTED in FF 28; 31; 32; 38; 40.0a2; 41.0a2 (en-US locales) (Almost every FF version change some code that breaks some things of this style. And cuz i DON'T update my FF version soon, you should be patient. VERY PATIENT) • Session Manager version 0.8.1.6 • Stylish version 1.4.3 • OS: Windows XP SP3 (Locale en) • I don't use Chrome. I like Opera, ussualy i don't use it too. • There are some code that you could make better. (i'm a beginner, i'm try to learn.) • a comment? YES. Just be objetive, not subjetive. Remmember that THIS IS STYLISH, PLEASE. YOUR PREFERENCES ISN'T THE ONLY WAY THAT THE THINGS SHOULD BE. This is it! CHANGELOG: ► 2015-07-05 ►►► First Release.
